numerical_features.name: num_dependents
numerical_features.description: Number of children or elderly relatives

numerical_features.name: income_per_family_member
numerical_features.description: Household annual income per family member

numerical_features.name: num_cars_owned
numerical_features.description: Number of cars owned by the customer

numerical_features.name: home_value
numerical_features.description: Purchase price of the customer's home

numerical_features.name: avg_annual_loan_payment
numerical_features.description: Customer's average annual payment for loans and credit cards

numerical_features.name: years_with_credit_card_issuer
numerical_features.description: Number of years the customer has had their current credit card issuer

numerical_features.name: average_commute_time
numerical_features.description: Customer's average time (minutes) it takes them to travel from home to their place of employment

numerical_features.name: years_of_home_ownership
numerical_features.description: Number of years the customer has owned their home

categorical_features.name: education_level
categorical_features.description: Customer's education level (high school, some college, bachelor's degree, graduate degree)

categorical_features.name: household_income_source
categorical_features.description: Customer's household income source (self-employed, employed by others)

categorical_features.name: remote_worker_status
categorical_features.description: (Onsite, Remote, Hybrid) If the customer primarily works from home or onsite for their employment

categorical_features.name: presence_of_pre_existing_condition
categorical_features.description: Yes/No if the customer has a pre-existing medical condition

categorical_features.name: home_ownership_status
categorical_features.description: Customer's home ownership status (owned, rented, currently owning with a mortgage)

ordinal_features.name: health_status
ordinal_features.description: Customer's health status (excellent, good, fair, poor)

ordinal_features.name: driving_record
ordinal_features.description: Customer's driving record (single accident, multiple accidents, DUI conviction)

ordinal_features.name: credit_history_length
ordinal_features.description: Length of customer's credit history (less than 2 years, 2-5 years, more than 5 years)

geographic_features.name: postal_code
geographic_features.description: Customer's zip code or postal code

behavioral_features.name: risks_covered
behavioral_features.description: Types of risks covered by the customer's insurance policies (e.g., life, health, auto)
